journal: Journal of Forensic and Legal Medicine
title: Erratum to ‘Estimation of postmortem interval (PMI) based on empty puparia of Phormia regina (Meigen) (Diptera: Calliphoridae) and third larval stage of Necrodes littoralis (L.) (Coleoptera: Silphidae) – Advantages of using different PMI indicators’ [J Forensic Leg Med, 55(2018), 95–98]
